title: recognise this font?
content:
hey guys

can anyone recognize the font used in this logo: [http://www.webroot.com/En\_US/img\_content/prig-logo-webroot-spy-sweeper.j...](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103013256/http:/www.webroot.com/En_US/img_content/prig-logo-webroot-spy-sweeper.jpg "http://www.webroot.com/En\_US/img\_content/prig-logo-webroot-spy-sweeper.jpg")

i’m doing a little site renovation for my friend and quite like the font.

Thanks!
author: sam_winchester

comments.content: Looks like Avant Garde, but its just a guess
Those Ss seem from a different typeface…
